```{r, echo = FALSE}
library(knitr)

"print.magick-image" <- function(x, ...){
  ext <- ifelse(length(x), tolower(image_info(x[1])$format), "gif")
  tmp <- tempfile(fileext = paste0(".", ext))
  image_write(x, path = tmp)
  knitr::include_graphics(tmp)
}
```

  image_scale("x600") %>%
